W17_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_000_DETAIL.text: The beautiful, sturdy castle of King Din. If it falls to the forces of Chaos, this world is doomed.

W17_LTXT_COMM_HOLE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_HOLE_000_DETAIL.text: New additions to the forces of Chaos emerge endlessly from this great chasm. Just being near it makes your blood run cold. Where could it possibly lead?

W17_LTXT_COMM_FOREST_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_FOREST_000_DETAIL.text: People tend to give this eerie forest a wide berth. Perhaps that makes it an ideal place for the forces of Chaos.

W17_LTXT_COMM_LAKE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_LAKE_000_DETAIL.text: The forces of Chaos launch their offensives on the castle from the lake. You should keep observing them vigilantly.

W17_LTXT_COMM_TEMPLE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_TEMPLE_000_DETAIL.text: This location may have been defiled by the forces of Chaos; it doesn't seem prayers from this spot will ever reach their destination.

W17_LTXT_COMM_RUIN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_RUIN_000_DETAIL.text: The forces of Chaos descend endlessly on these ruins. What could be causing this?

W17_LTXT_COMM_GRAVEYARD_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_GRAVEYARD_000_DETAIL.text: Those who perished in battle are typically laid to rest here, but the current situation is too dire for proper burials.

W17_LTXT_COMM_FORT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_FORT_000_DETAIL.text: A fortress that was occupied by the forces of Chaos for a very long time. Though countless warriors now gather here, the enemy still seeks to reclaim it.

W17_LTXT_COMM_CITY_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_CITY_000_DETAIL.text: A few brave townsfolk refused to evacuate this place so they might continue fighting the forces of Chaos.

W17_LTXT_COMM_MINE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_MINE_000_DETAIL.text: This place has been dug up without pause; you now have an equal chance of finding both ore and the forces of Chaos inside.

W17_LTXT_COMM_FIELD_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_FIELD_000_DETAIL.text: These fields provide the food humanity needs to survive.

W17_LTXT_COMM_VILLAGE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_VILLAGE_000_DETAIL.text: As this village is close to the castle, it continues to repel the forces of Chaos.

W17_LTXT_COMM_CHURCH_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_CHURCH_000_DETAIL.text: A place that provides emotional support to the people of the land. Alas, the forces of Chaos show no respect for holy ground.

W17_LTXT_COMM_TEMPLE_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_TEMPLE_010_DETAIL.text: Your forces are currently securing this temple, a place where people pray to the divinity of this land.

W17_LTXT_COMM_RUIN_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_RUIN_010_DETAIL.text: Your forces are currently securing these ruins, a place that speaks to the history of this land.

W17_LTXT_COMM_GRAVEYARD_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_GRAVEYARD_010_DETAIL.text: Your forces are currently securing this graveyard, a place where those who died in battle are laid to rest.

W17_LTXT_COMM_FORT_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_FORT_010_DETAIL.text: Your forces are currently securing this fortress, which is sure to be a key strategic point going forward.

W17_LTXT_COMM_CITY_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_CITY_010_DETAIL.text: Your forces are currently securing this town, in which countless people live.

W17_LTXT_COMM_MINE_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_MINE_010_DETAIL.text: Your forces are currently securing this mine, which is filled with natural resources.

W17_LTXT_COMM_FIELD_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_FIELD_010_DETAIL.text: Your forces are currently securing these fields, which provide the food humanity needs to survive.

W17_LTXT_COMM_VILLAGE_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_VILLAGE_010_DETAIL.text: Your forces are currently securing this village, in which countless people live.

W17_LTXT_COMM_CHURCH_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_CHURCH_010_DETAIL.text: Your forces are currently securing this church, which provides emotional support for the people of this land.

W17_LTXT_COMM_TEMPLE_020_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_TEMPLE_020_DETAIL.text: This temple is currently neutral. You should focus the war effort elsewhere.

W17_LTXT_COMM_RUIN_020_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_RUIN_020_DETAIL.text: These ruins are currently neutral. You should focus the war effort elsewhere.

W17_LTXT_COMM_GRAVEYARD_020_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_GRAVEYARD_020_DETAIL.text: This graveyard is currently neutral. You should focus the war effort elsewhere.

W17_LTXT_COMM_FORT_020_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_FORT_020_DETAIL.text: This fortress is currently neutral. You should focus the war effort elsewhere.

W17_LTXT_COMM_CITY_020_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_CITY_020_DETAIL.text: This town is currently neutral. You should focus the war effort elsewhere.

W17_LTXT_COMM_MINE_020_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_MINE_020_DETAIL.text: This mine is currently neutral. You should focus the war effort elsewhere.

W17_LTXT_COMM_FIELD_020_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_FIELD_020_DETAIL.text: These fields are currently neutral. You should focus the war effort elsewhere.

W17_LTXT_COMM_VILLAGE_020_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_VILLAGE_020_DETAIL.text: This village is currently neutral. You should focus the war effort elsewhere.

W17_LTXT_COMM_CHURCH_020_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_CHURCH_020_DETAIL.text: This church is currently neutral. You should focus the war effort elsewhere.

W17_LTXT_COMM_TEMPLE_030_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_TEMPLE_030_DETAIL.text: This temple has fallen to the enemy. However, you must focus the war effort elsewhere.

W17_LTXT_COMM_RUIN_030_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_RUIN_030_DETAIL.text: These ruins have fallen to the enemy. However, you must focus the war effort elsewhere.

W17_LTXT_COMM_GRAVEYARD_030_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_GRAVEYARD_030_DETAIL.text: This graveyard has fallen to the enemy. However, you must focus the war effort elsewhere.

W17_LTXT_COMM_FORT_030_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_FORT_030_DETAIL.text: This fortress has fallen to the enemy. However, you must focus the war effort elsewhere.

W17_LTXT_COMM_CITY_030_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_CITY_030_DETAIL.text: This town has fallen to the enemy. However, you must focus the war effort elsewhere.

W17_LTXT_COMM_MINE_030_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_MINE_030_DETAIL.text: This mine has fallen to the enemy. However, you must focus the war effort elsewhere.

W17_LTXT_COMM_FIELD_030_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_FIELD_030_DETAIL.text: These fields have fallen to the enemy. However, you must focus the war effort elsewhere.

W17_LTXT_COMM_VILLAGE_030_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_VILLAGE_030_DETAIL.text: This village has fallen to the enemy. However, you must focus the war effort elsewhere.

W17_LTXT_COMM_CHURCH_030_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_LTXT_COMM_CHURCH_030_DETAIL.text: This church has fallen to the enemy. However, you must focus the war effort elsewhere.

W17_WRLD_COMM_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_WRLD_COMM_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: You have arrived in Brighthome, a world where warriors gather.

W17_SCAN_COMM_INITIAL_WAVE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_SCAN_COMM_INITIAL_WAVE_000_DETAIL.text: War is being waged across this land. For what purpose have you been summoned here?

W17_EVAR_COMM_CASTLE_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_CASTLE_000_TITLE.text: The Castle That Protects This Land

W17_EVAR_COMM_CASTLE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_CASTLE_000_DETAIL.text: You feel as if you're being guided to this beautiful, sturdy castle, and hear someone calling out to you.

W17_EVAR_COMM_CASTLE_TUT_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_CASTLE_TUT_000_TITLE.text: The Castle That Protects This Land

W17_EVAR_COMM_CASTLE_TUT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_CASTLE_TUT_000_DETAIL.text: You feel as if you're being guided to this beautiful, sturdy castle, and hear someone calling out to you.

W17_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLE_000_DETAIL.text: The forces of Chaos are approaching the temple. Repel them with the other warriors at your side and prevent them from expanding their hold over the land.

W17_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLE_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLE_010_DETAIL.text: If this area is left unprotected for too long, the forces of Chaos will claim it as their own. You must ensure it's always either occupied by your forces or neutral.

W17_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLE_TUT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLE_TUT_000_DETAIL.text: The forces of Chaos are approaching the temple. Repel them with the other warriors at your side and prevent them from expanding their hold over the land.

W17_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLE_TUT_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLE_TUT_010_DETAIL.text: If this area is left unprotected for too long, the forces of Chaos will claim it as their own. You must ensure it's always either occupied by your forces or neutral.

W17_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLE_ITEM_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLE_ITEM_000_DETAIL.text: You must repel the approaching forces of Chaos from this area. A pirate seeking legendary treasure has also been sighted here.

W17_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLE_ITEM_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLE_ITEM_010_DETAIL.text: If this area is left unprotected for too long, the forces of Chaos will claim it as their own. A pirate seeking legendary treasure has also been sighted here.

W17_EVAR_COMM_RUIN_ITEM_000_DETAIL.text: You must repel the approaching forces of chaos from this area. A pirate seeking legendary treasure has also been sighted here.

W17_EVAR_COMM_RUIN_ITEM_010_DETAIL.text: If this area is left unprotected for too long, the forces of Chaos will claim it as their own. A pirate seeking legendary treasure has also been sighted here.

W17_EVAR_COMM_FORT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_FORT_000_DETAIL.text: Defeat the forces of Chaos and reclaim the fortress.

W17_EVAR_COMM_CITY_ITEM_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI

W17_EVAR_COMM_CITY_ITEM_010_DETAIL.text: If this area is left unprotected for too long, the forces of Chaos will claim it as their own. A pirate seeking legendary treasure has also been sighted here.

W17_EVAR_COMM_CHURCH_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_CHURCH_000_DETAIL.text: The warrior guarding the church wants to speak to newly summoned warriors.

W17_EVAR_COMM_CHURCH_000_BUTTON.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_CHURCH_000_BUTTON.text: Speak to the Warrior at the Church

W17_EVAR_COMM_CHURCH_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_CHURCH_010_DETAIL.text: You should check on the warrior guarding the church from time to time to ensure all is well.

W17_EVAR_COMM_CHURCH_TUT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_CHURCH_TUT_000_DETAIL.text: The warrior guarding the church wants to speak to newly summoned warriors.

W17_EVAR_COMM_CHURCH_TUT_000_BUTTON.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_CHURCH_TUT_000_BUTTON.text: Speak to the Warrior at the Church

W17_EVAR_COMM_CHURCH_ITEM_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_CHURCH_ITEM_000_DETAIL.text: The warrior guarding the church wants to speak to newly summoned warriors. A pirate seeking legendary treasure has also been sighted here.

W17_EVAR_COMM_CHURCH_ITEM_010_TITLE.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_CHURCH_ITEM_010_TITLE.text: The State of the Church/Legendary Treasure

W17_EVAR_COMM_CHURCH_ITEM_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_CHURCH_ITEM_010_DETAIL.text: You should visit the church to ensure all is well. A pirate seeking legendary treasure has also been sighted there.

W17_EVAR_COMM_GRAVEYARD_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_GRAVEYARD_000_DETAIL.text: The forces of Chaos are approaching the graveyard. Repel them with the other warriors at your side and prevent them from expanding their hold over the land.

W17_EVAR_COMM_GRAVEYARD_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_GRAVEYARD_010_DETAIL.text: If this area is left unprotected for too long, the forces of Chaos will claim it as their own. You must ensure it's always either occupied by your forces or neutral.

W17_EVAR_COMM_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_DETAIL.text: The forces of Chaos are approaching the graveyard. Repel them with the other warriors at your side and prevent them from expanding their hold over the land.

W17_EVAR_COMM_GRAVEYARD_ITEM_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_GRAVEYARD_ITEM_000_DETAIL.text: You must repel the approaching forces of Chaos from this area. A pirate seeking legendary treasure has also been sighted here.

W17_EVAR_COMM_GRAVEYARD_ITEM_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_GRAVEYARD_ITEM_010_DETAIL.text: If this area is left unprotected for too long, the forces of Chaos will claim it as their own. A pirate seeking legendary treasure has also been sighted here.

W17_EVAR_COMM_MINE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_MINE_000_DETAIL.text: The miners seem to have a lot on their minds. Perhaps you can help them in some way?

W17_EVAR_COMM_MINE_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_MINE_010_DETAIL.text: The miners have to keep working even while defending the mine. You should check in on them from time to time.

W17_EVAR_COMM_MINE_TUT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_MINE_TUT_000_DETAIL.text: The miners seem to have a lot on their minds. Perhaps you can help them in some way?

W17_EVAR_COMM_MINE_ITEM_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_MINE_ITEM_000_DETAIL.text: The miners seem to have a lot on their minds. A pirate seeking legendary treasure has also been sighted here.

W17_EVAR_COMM_MINE_ITEM_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_MINE_ITEM_010_DETAIL.text: You should see if the mine is still unharmed. A pirate seeking legendary treasure has also been sighted there.

W17_EVAR_COMM_FIELD_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_FIELD_000_DETAIL.text: The forces of Chaos are approaching the fields. Repel them with the other warriors at your side and prevent them from expanding their hold over the land.

W17_EVAR_COMM_FIELD_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_FIELD_010_DETAIL.text: If this area is left unprotected for too long, the forces of Chaos will claim it as their own. You must ensure it's always either occupied by your forces or neutral.

W17_EVAR_COMM_FIELD_TUT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI

W17_EVAR_COMM_FIELD_TUT_010_DETAIL.text: If this area is left unprotected for too long, the forces of Chaos will claim it as their own. You must ensure it's always either occupied by your forces or neutral.

W17_EVAR_COMM_FIELD_ITEM_000_DETAIL.text: You must repel the approaching forces of Chaos from this area. A pirate seeking legendary treasure has also been sighted here.

W17_EVAR_COMM_VILLAGE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI

W17_EVAR_COMM_VILLAGE_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_VILLAGE_010_DETAIL.text: If this area is left unprotected for too long, the forces of Chaos will claim it as their own. You must ensure it's always either occupied by your forces or neutral.

W17_EVAR_COMM_VILLAGE_TUT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_VILLAGE_TUT_000_DETAIL.text: The forces of Chaos are approaching the village. Repel them with the other warriors at your side and prevent them from expanding their hold over the land.

W17_EVAR_COMM_VILLAGE_TUT_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_VILLAGE_TUT_010_DETAIL.text: If this area is left unprotected for too long, the forces of Chaos will claim it as their own. You must ensure it's always either occupied by your forces or neutral.

W17_EVAR_COMM_VILLAGE_ITEM_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_VILLAGE_ITEM_000_DETAIL.text: You must repel the approaching forces of Chaos from this area. A pirate seeking legendary treasure has also been sighted here.

W17_EVAR_COMM_VILLAGE_ITEM_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_VILLAGE_ITEM_010_DETAIL.text: If this area is left unprotected for too long, the forces of Chaos will claim it as their own. A pirate seeking legendary treasure has also been sighted here.

W17_EVAR_COMM_HOLE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_HOLE_000_DETAIL.text: The time has come to seal the Cleft of Chaos. You and the warriors must set off for the final battle.

W17_EVAR_COMM_HOLE_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_HOLE_010_DETAIL.text: The time has come to seal the Cleft of Chaos. You and the warriors must set off for the final battle.

W17_EVAR_COMM_HOLE_020_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_HOLE_020_DETAIL.text: The time has come to seal the Cleft of Chaos. You and the warriors must set off for the final battle.

W17_EVAR_COMM_HOLE_030_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_HOLE_030_DETAIL.text: The time has come to seal the Cleft of Chaos. You and the warriors must set off for the final battle.

W17_EVAR_COMM_HOLE_040_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_HOLE_040_DETAIL.text: Obtaining the legendary treasure has turned the tide of battle in your favor. The time has finally come to seal the Cleft of Chaos.

W17_EVAR_COMM_WORLDEXIT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_WORLDEXIT_000_DETAIL.text: The time has come to depart this world. You can leave as soon as you are ready.

W17_EVAR_COMM_REBEL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_REBEL_000_DETAIL.text: The warriors summoned by King Din have formed a rebel army. Stop them from reaching the castle.

W17_EVAR_COMM_REBEL_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_REBEL_010_DETAIL.text: The rebels are drawing dangerously close to King Din's castle. If they were to occupy it, it would spell the end of this world.

W17_EVAR_COMM_ITEM_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_ITEM_000_DETAIL.text: A strange person is searching for something in the castle. Perhaps you should try to help?

W17_EVAR_COMM_SIMON_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_COMM_SIMON_000_DETAIL.text: Gunner is in the fortress, and seems preoccupied by something. What could be wrong?
